org.gvsig.symbology.gui.styling
Class LineFill

java.lang.Object
  com.iver.cit.gvsig.gui.styling.AbstractTypeSymbolEditor
      org.gvsig.symbology.gui.styling.LineFill
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class LineFill
extends com.iver.cit.gvsig.gui.styling.AbstractTypeSymbolEditor
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

LineFill allows to store and modify the properties that fills a polygon with a padding composed of lines

This functionality is carried out thanks to a tab (line fill)which is included in the panel to edit the properities of a symbol (SymbolEditor)how is explained in AbstractTypeSymbolEditor.

This tab permits the user to change the line that composes the padding (btnLineSymbol),the outline of the polygon (btnOutlineSymbol), the color between the lines (jcc),the angle of the line(incrAngle), the offset between paralel lines(incrOffset) and the separation (incrSeparation).

Author:
jaume dominguez faus - jaume.dominguez@iver.es
See Also:
